attributes.action: Legalise Gender Non-Binary identities and support Trans and Non-Binary people
attributes.additional_details: The government must represent all people, including Trans and Non-Binary people. All we ask for is legal recognition of our gender identities and support through the NHS to be who we truly are. This is the governments decision and they must make it
attributes.background: Legally recognise Mon-Binary identities, allowing us to be Non-Binary on legal documents including passports and extend funding to NHS services and allow up to have ALL gender reaffirming services such as Breast augmentation for MTF people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow gender inclusiveness on all official documents: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560159

Amend the Equality Act 2010 to include protections for Gender Identity: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560937

Reform the Gender Recognition Act: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327108
